name: Leprakitty
description:
The Leprakitty has lost his lucky horseshoe and now he must- blah blah blah, wee all know why you're here, and that's for the EXTREME DEMON KILLING ACTION, and here's how you're going to do that.

WASD to move

Left Mouse to shoot

Spacebar to dodge towards the mouse

Left Shift to enter bullet time

Dashing through enemy bullets builds your Luck Meter, the luck meter fuels your time slowing, and the higher your luck, the more likely you are to score a critical hit for massive damage.
